item.title: How to Buy Wormhole | Buy W in 4 Steps (January 2025)
item.description: Wormhole is a decentralized, cross-chain messaging protocol that facilitates seamless communication and asset transfers between various blockchain networks.Â By enabling interoperability across over 30 blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and Binance Smart Chain, Wormhole empowers developers to build multichain applications and bridges, enhancing the interconnectedness of the blockchain ecosystem. In 2024, Wormhole introduced the W token [â€¦]

item.title: Wormhole grant brings Worldcoin ID to Solana
item.description: Worldcoin announced the selection of 17 grantees for Wave1 of its Community Grants Program aimed at empowering Wormhole and other passionate cross-chain protocol builders. Wormhole expressed their excitement about being part of the Worldcoin Tech Tree that would oversee the advancement of Secure Multi-party Computation (SMPC).
item.content:encoded: Worldcoin announced the selection of 17 grantees for Wave1 of its Community Grants Program aimed at empowering Wormhole and other passionate cross-chain protocol builders. Wormhole expressed their excitement about being part of the Worldcoin Tech Tree that would oversee the advancement of Secure Multi-party Computation (SMPC).
item.author: Cryptopolitan (Cryptopolitan)

item.title: Wormhole paves the way for World IDâ€™s arrival on Solana after receiving a $70,000 grant in June
item.description: Blockchain interoperability protocol Wormhole has successfully paved the way for World IDs on the Solana blockchain. Solana builders and developers will have the capacity to integrate World ID on Solana-based protocols.
item.content:encoded: Blockchain interoperability protocol Wormhole has successfully paved the way for World IDs on the Solana blockchain. Solana builders and developers will have the capacity to integrate World ID on Solana-based protocols.

item.title: Unraveling The $325 Million Wormhole Hack: How CREâ€™s Expertise Came To The Rescue
item.description: Understanding The Wormhole Hack: How it Happened The cryptocurrency world was rocked by a major security breach in February 2022 when the Wormhole bridge, a popular cross-chain bridge protocol, fell victim to a sophisticated hack. The attack, which has been dubbed one of the largest crypto heists in history, saw cybercriminals make off with a [â€¦]
